sqlMap.sql: id id, trade_date tradeDate, is_tradeday isTradeday
sqlMap.select:
select
from CFG_CHINAKONG_TRADE_DAYS td where td.trade_date = #date#

select
from CFG_CHINAKONG_TRADE_DAYS td where td.trade_date > #date# and td.is_tradeday = 'Y' order by td.trade_date

select id id, trade_date tradeDate, is_tradeday isTradeday from( select id, trade_date, is_tradeday from CFG_CHINAKONG_TRADE_DAYS td where td.trade_date < #date# and td.is_tradeday = 'Y' order by td.trade_date desc) where rownum=1
